data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eDocument Number Statuses'
define view entity zetr_ddl_i_edoc_number_status
  as select from    zetr_t_edocnum as NumberStatus
    left outer join zetr_t_eiser   as InvoiceSerials  on  InvoiceSerials.bukrs = NumberStatus.bukrs
                                                      and InvoiceSerials.serpr = NumberStatus.serpr
    left outer join zetr_t_easer   as ArchiveSerials  on  ArchiveSerials.bukrs = NumberStatus.bukrs
                                                      and ArchiveSerials.serpr = NumberStatus.serpr
    left outer join zetr_t_edser   as DeliverySerials on  DeliverySerials.bukrs = NumberStatus.bukrs
                                                      and DeliverySerials.serpr = NumberStatus.serpr
  association to parent zetr_ddl_i_edoc_number_ranges as _Ranges on  $projection.CompanyCode       = _Ranges.CompanyCode
                                                                 and $projection.NumberRangeObject = _Ranges.NumberRangeObject
{
  key NumberStatus.bukrs as CompanyCode,
  key NumberStatus.nrobj as NumberRangeObject,
  key NumberStatus.serpr as SerialPrefix,
  key NumberStatus.numrn as NumberRangeNumber,
  key NumberStatus.gjahr as FiscalYear,
      NumberStatus.numst as NumberStatus,
      case NumberStatus.nrobj
        when 'ZETR_EIN' then InvoiceSerials.descr
        when 'ZETR_EAR' then ArchiveSerials.descr
        when 'ZETR_EDL' then DeliverySerials.descr
        else ''
      end                as Description,
      _Ranges // Make association public
}
